references.paper_title: 3d gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS), which is a core component used for differentiable rendering in the AKD framework.

references.paper_title: Cogvideox: Text-to-video diffusion models with an expert transformer
references.reason: This paper describes CogVideoX-5B, the video diffusion model used by AKD for generating motion sequences from text prompts, providing guidance for the synthesis process.

This paper introduces Score Distillation Sampling (SDS), a key technique employed by AKD to distill 3D models from text-to-image priors, enabling the framework to leverage pre-trained diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Smpl: A skinned multi-person linear model
references.reason: This paper introduces SMPL, a skinned multi-person linear model, which is a dedicated deformable model for human bodies that is related to work on articulated motion reconstruction.

references.paper_title: Training deep nets with sublinear memory cost
references.reason: This paper introduces gradient checkpointing, a technique to selectively store intermediate activations and recompute them during the backward pass, making it feasible to perform SDS optimization with large DiTs.
